Classic RWD - A simple, classic & responsive theme for your tumblr

Classic RWD - A simple, classic & responsive theme for your tumblr

Enjoy a simple responsive (RWD) theme for your tumblr.

Customize colors, fonts and the adaptive image on top of your blog and don’t worry about browser compatibility: based on Bootstrap, your blog will look good on any device!
